Users of Sooda
The following companies use Sooda or technologies based on it and have agreed to be mentioned here:
ATM S.A. - uses Sooda as a basis for the Atmo workflow technology and some in-house applications
TVP S.A. - Polish public TV broadcaster - workflow application - part of the iTVP Project
Getronics Poland - integrated asset and task management application
PTC sp. z o.o. - Polish mobile operator - integrated request and change request handling application
If you want your project/company mentioned here, send your company/project details to the mailing list.
